DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective chart review/data collection study of the per oral endoscopic myotomy (POEM) procedure, that will include questionnaires administered throughout the study. Subjects enrolled will be those intending to have a POEM procedure. Data will be collected and reviewed through 12 months post-op.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: 1. Diagnosis of achalasia 2. Age 1875 3. Mentally competent to give informed consent 4. Scheduled to undergo a POEM procedure Exclusion: 1. Pregnant women 2. Any prior surgical treatment for achalasia
